Title: Dancing with body and being
Content: To write about Jyothi Lakshmi is, in a real sense, to capture the spirit of a specific ethos of Indian cinema, perhaps totally unknown to the present generation bombarded with stunning images of glamo
Author: N. Manu Chakravarthy
